title: New: spells – colors
body:
Impressing with a handful of tracks four months back, San Francisco’s **spells** has returned with new track _colors_.

A marked progression, both in terms of songwriting and production, it’s synth-pop at it’s most emotionally fraught, sort of how I imagine **Sinéad O’Connor** might sound had she been born into the 00’s music scene. Check out colors below.
